stimulusHtml: Which of the following replacements for  /* initial value */  and  /* updated value */  can be used so that the method works as intended?

features.html:
The following method is intended to return  true  if all elements in row  x  of the 2D array  nums  are positive and  false  otherwise.

 

/**
 *  Precondition: x is a valid row index of nums.
 */
public static boolean allPositiveInRow(int[][]nums, int x) 
{ 
   boolean allPositive = /* initial value */; 
   for (int y = 0; y < nums[0].length; y++) 
   { 
      if (nums[x][y] <= 0) 
      { 
         allPositive = /* updated value */; 
      } 
   } 
   return allPositive; 
}

choicesHtml: Replace  /* initial value */  with  true  and replace  /* updated value */  with  true.
Replace  /* initial value */  with  true  and replace  /* updated value */  with  false.
Replace  /* initial value */  with  false  and replace  /* updated value */  with  true.
Replace  /* initial value */  with  false  and replace  /* updated value */  with  false.
